lead_paragraph: A Sunwing Airlines pilot was charged with alcohol-related offenses after being found passed out in the captain’s chair while the plane was on the tarmac, the police said.
snippet: A Sunwing Airlines pilot was charged with alcohol-related offenses after being found passed out in the captain’s chair while the plane was on the tarmac, the police said....

headline.main: Airline Pilot, Believed to Be Drunk, Is Pulled From Cockpit in Canada
headline.print_headline: Pilot, Feared Drunk, Is Pulled From Jetliner
